subject: Mountain Climbing
Rafts
lead_paragraph: Some years ago, in a covered market in the north of Yemen near the Saudi border, I meandered down a smoky, teeming alley, thick with the sounds and smells of Arabia.
snippet: Some years ago, in a covered market in the north of Yemen near the Saudi border, I meandered down a smoky, teeming alley, thick with the sounds and smells of Arabia.
